overview: Stressed out law student Zach McAllister takes a five day bicycle trip through the peaceful autumn woods of Western Maryland with his wife, his lover, and his lover's boyfriend. Not exactly the getaway vacation he planned. Along the way, they encounter everything you'd expect on a camping trip - rain, infidelity, and the realization that a truly healthy relationship is just about impossible to find.
tagline: Life is like riding a bicycle. As long as you keep pedaling, you won't fall down.
title: Forest for the Trees
